speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m well, thank you. How can I help you today?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling about the overdue balance on your account. You owe quite a bit of money, and I need to sort this out.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand. Could you provide me with the specific details?

speaker: Agent
text: Look, if I have to chase you down for this, it's gonna get ugly. Can you just tell me your address?

speaker: Customer
text: I can’t share my information without verifying my identity first.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, I just want to get this over with. Your account balance is $1,200, you better have a plan.

speaker: Customer
text: I will arrange to pay, but please refrain from using that kind of language.

speaker: Agent
text: I’ll talk however I want! This is a serious matter, you need to get your shit together.

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your concern, but I expect professionalism in our communication.

speaker: Agent
text: Professionalism? Ha! You’re the one dodging payments! Get real!

speaker: Customer
text: I’m trying to resolve this. Let’s work together calmly.

speaker: Agent
text: Fine, but make it quick. I don’t have time for this BS.

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your time, but I will be escalating this conversation if it continues this way.

speaker: Agent
text: Go ahead! I don’t give a damn! You think I’m scared of complaints?
